name: LittleBigAwoglet 2
description:
Play, Create, and Share, and with many objects to play with, the only limit is YOUR imagination!

Controls (can be rebound in the title screen)
  • Arrow keys to move
  • R to have a heart attack
  • WASD to use the "emotion palette"
  • Backspace to drop the current powerup

This game is a continuation of the LittleBigAwoglet series. You can download the original in the Discord server, as it only ever was shared there.
Awoglet is from The Awoglet How 6, made by the creators of Sheriff Domestic. (why do i keep getting hate over including awoglet in the game wtf)
LittleBigPlanet is a trademark of Sony, i do not own anything of theirs, nor me or my game is associated directly with it.
Sounds are mostly from LittleBigPlanet.
Music authors are credited when possible.
I do not own anything besides the game itself.
